name: Unknown Item
overview: Normal enemies include Basic, Fast, Range, Tank and Protector. These enemies are in a single group and their chance to spawn in a wave will add to 100% for each wave.

spawn_mechanics.spawn_distribution: Normal enemies share a total spawn percentage that adds up to 100% per wave
spawn_mechanics.distribution_variation: The distribution between different normal enemy types varies based on wave progression
spawn_mechanics.spawn_cap: All normal enemies count toward the 120 normal enemy spawn cap

basic.description: Your basic enemy, does nothing special
properties: Standard health, speed, and coin value

fast.description: Higher speed makes them reach the tower faster

tank.description: High health makes them difficult to defeat quickly

ranged.description: Can attack the tower from a distance

protector.ability: Enemies within range cannot be insta killed and take 60% reduced damage
protector.tier_requirement: Can only spawn on tier 2 or higher
protector.spawn_limit: Only 10 can be spawned at one time
protector.spawn_rules: Special spawn rules with only 1 per wave and a cooldown between spawn chances

special_rules.protector_mechanics: Protectors have unique spawn mechanics with cooldowns and limits
special_rules.targeting: Normal enemies can be targeted by all tower abilities and ultimate weapons
